title: Osomatsu-san: Haru no Zenkoku Dai Senbatsu Jouei-sai - Sentou Quiz 2
original_name: おそ松さん 春の全国大センバツ上映祭 銭湯クイズ 2
sinopse:
An all-new anime short episode included in a selection theatrical screening of the anime series together with main episodes for each of the six Matsuno brothers from the television anime series and the Osomatsu-san: Ouma de Kobanashi special.

(Source: AniDB)
